properties.description:
Verify Large String Variable 
Store in Set Variable 
Process the Large String Variable Using below Java Core Actions
Read Table from Text 
JsonPath Query
Read Table from Json
Process the Large String Variable using Parent and Child WF
Verify Large String variable Using Go Action
Find String
Replace String
SubString
TrimString
Escape Regex Metacharacter 
Match Regex
Convert Json to XML
Store XML into LS Variable
Xpath query 
Read Table from XML 
Verify Negative Test Case 
Store the 10MB data into Large String variable
Create more than 2 Large String Variable
Pass the Value to Large String Variable
Verify timeout exception for Convert JsonToXML Action
